trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Hanterar en mängd användargränssnittet relaterade <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: Each Adorner can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: Varje dekorationer kan aktiveras och inaktiveras.

trans-unit.source: Only enabled Adorner objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Endast aktiverade dekorationer objekt visas träffar test- och paint meddelanden från <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: An Adorner can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: En dekorationer kan ses som en proxy mellan användargränssnittet relaterade element, som består av alla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>objekt, och i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [översikt över beteendet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The Adorner constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktorn dekorationer skapar en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>och är aktiverad som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: När en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>läggs till i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, samlingen anges den här egenskapen så att <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>anropa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> är aktiverad.

trans-unit.source: If the Enabled property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: Om egenskapen Enabled `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>klassen skickar `HitTest` och `Paint` meddelanden till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> är aktiverade, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En samling <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Framtvingar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> att uppdatera dekorationer fönster.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Framtvingar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> att uppdatera dekorationer fönster inom den angivna <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Området för att ogiltigförklara.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Framtvingar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> att uppdatera dekorationer fönster inom den angivna <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> att upphäva.
